mapper.insert: insert into F_img (uploadpath, filename, filetype, m_id, uuid) values (#{uploadpath},#{filename},#{filetype},#{m_id},#{uuid})
insert into P_img (pi_id, p_id, uploadpath, filename, filetype, fileroom) values ('pi_'||SEQ_PI_ID_NUM.nextval,#{p_id},#{uploadpath},#{filename},#{filetype},#{fileroom})
insert into R_img (ri_id, p_id, uploadpath, filename, filetype) values ('ri_'||SEQ_RI_ID_NUM.nextval,#{p_id},#{uploadpath},#{filename},#{filetype})
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, uploadpath || uuid || '_' || filename AS savePath, DECODE(filetype, 'I', uploadpath || 's_' || uuid || '_' || filename, 'NO_image') AS s_savePath FROM b_img t WHERE bno = #{bno}
SELECT t.*, uploadpath || m_id || filename AS savePath, DECODE(filetype, 'I', uploadpath || 's_' || m_id || filename, 'NO_image') AS s_savePath FROM F_img t WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
